headline: BALZERS TURBO PUMP 56 L/S
description: Rebuilt Turbo Pump  Compatible turbo pump controller Model TCP 120 not inlcuded, but available for sale.   See our item 4481:  Balzers TCP 120 Turbo Pump Controller
keywords: turbomolecular pump turbo pumps turbos drag pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Turbo Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Balzers-Pfeiffe
Model TPU 060
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 56.0 l/s (118.7 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 7.50E-9(En) torr (10.00E-9 mbar)
Inlet Flange Conflat 114.3 mm (4.500 in)
Foreline Flange KF 16.0 mm (0.630 in)
Controller Included No
Cables Included No
Duty--Service Normal
Inlet Screen Included Yes
Bearing Type Other
Installation Orientation Horizontal or Vertical ONLY
Rotational Speed 90,000 RPM
Startup Time 3 minutes
External Cooling Air Cooled
Other Information Bearing Type:
High-vacuum side: permanent magnet bearing
Backing pressure side: wick-lubricated miniature ball bearing
Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.500 in (11.4 cm)
Height 6.500 in (16.5 cm)
Weight 10 lb (5 kg)
